{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|任|貝|t2=shell, money|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s}} – a kind of payment. 任 has meaning of “duty, employment”, so connotations of “money paid for employment (hire)” or “money that one has a duty to pay (rent)”.
